fact1: 740 plastic bottles are bought in Japan every second.
fact2: More than 8 million tons of plastic are dumped into our oceans every year.
fact3: Approximately 2 million plastic bags are used every minute around the world.
fact4: The average plastic bag is used for only 12 minutes!
fact5: Global plastic production has doubled in the past 50 years.
fact6: It's estimated that 50% of the plastic we consume is used just once and thrown away.
fact7: Approximately 90 percent of all trash floating on the ocean's surface is plastic, with 46,000 pieces of plastic per square mile.
fact8: There are over 5 trillion pieces of plastic in our oceans – enough to circle the Earth over 400 times.
fact9: Japan is the world's second-biggest producer per capita of plastic waste behind the U.S.
fact10: Over 25 billion PET bottle products are produced every year in Japan, equal to approximately 180 bottles per person.
fact11: By 2050, it is estimated that there will be more plastic than fish in the sea.
spot.share.title: Share this refill spot
